News, "companies hiring more men is discrimination"
Usa court system, "no; it's not"
News, "censor the entire internet!"

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5518c83a63687273b0110100#post_5518c83a63687273b0110100
I'm not exaggerating about the internet censorship thing either; people on not just news sites but reddit, youtube, twitter and a ton of other sites are getting banhammered for even talking about it.

If you're on youtube I would stay the fuck away from the subject cause it's pretty bad.

Youtubers, "Let's talk about the latest court case in California"
*You have been permabanned, your videos taken down and your IP blocked for copyright infringement*
